overview:
Brian Jaquet is a digital media and consumer electronics PR consultant working for Dijit Media and Sling Media currently.

Previously, Brian was Director of Corporate Communications for OnLive, Inc. which delivers your favorite video games instantly to any device at anytime, anywhere. Play on your TV, PC/Mac or tablet and soon on a whole host of consumer electronics products.

Prior to OnLive, Jaquet was Director of Corporate Communications for Roku, Inc. makers of the Roku player, which streams content from over 250 sources right to the living room TV using a standard wired or wireless broadband connection.

Prior to Roku, Jaquet headed up all PR and communications activities for Sling Media, which focused on bringing your home TV experience to your desktop, laptop or mobile phone anywhere in the world. He joined Sling Media in August, 2005, just after the launch of the first Slingbox left in April, 2009 just over 18 months after it was acquired by EchoStar.

Prior to Sling Media, Brian spent four years at Handspring, Inc. and then subsequently Palm Inc. He also spent 5+ years at PR agencies including A&R Partners, Copithorne and Bellows and Porter Novelli.

Jaquet has spent 14+ years in public relations and corporate communications representing a wide variety of technology companies who specialize in digital media, mobility, consumer electronics, enterprise computing and wireless.
